gui
Class LockingAdapter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.swing.event.MouseInputAdapter
        |
        +--gui.LockingAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.MouseInputListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
public class LockingAdapter
extends javax.swing.event.MouseInputAdapter

This class handles the mouseinputs when the user wants to draw a new image lock area on the screen

Version:
1.0
Author:
Bjorn Husberg and Louise Tysk
